scope.gco:CharacterString: Codelists for description of metadata datasets compliant with ISO/TC 211 19115:2003 and 19139

entry.description: date identifies when the resource was brought into existence
entry.label: creation

entry.description: date identifies when the resource was issued
entry.label: publication

entry.description: date identifies when the resource was examined or re-examined and improved or amended
entry.label: revision

entry.description: date identifies when resource expires
entry.label: expiry

entry.description: date identifies when resource was last updated
entry.label: lastUpdate

entry.description: date identifies when resource was last reviewed
entry.label: lastRevision

entry.description: date identifies when resource will be next updated
entry.label: nextUpdate

entry.description: date identifies when resource became not available or obtainable
entry.label: unavailable

entry.description: date identifies when resource became in force
entry.label: inForce

entry.description: date identifies when resource was adopted
entry.label: adopted

entry.description: date identifies when resource was deprecated
entry.label: deprecated

entry.description: date identifies when resource was superseded or replaced by another resource
entry.label: superseded

entry.description: time at which the data are considered to become valid. NOTE: There could be quite a delay between creation and validity begins
entry.label: validityBegins

entry.description: time at which the data are no longer considered to be valid
entry.label: validityExpires

entry.description: the date that the resource shall be released for public access
entry.label: released

entry.description: date identifies when an instance of the resource was distributed
entry.label: distribution

entry.description: online instructions for transferring data from one storage device or system to another
entry.label: download

entry.description: online information about the resource
entry.label: information

entry.description: online instructions for requesting the resource from the provider
entry.label: offlineAccess

entry.description: online order process for obtening the resource
entry.label: order

entry.description: online search interface for seeking out information about the resource
entry.label: search

entry.description: complete metadata provided
entry.label: completeMetadata

entry.description: browse graphic provided
entry.label: browseGraphic

entry.description: online resource upload capability provided
entry.label: upload

entry.description: online email service provided
entry.label: emailService

entry.description: online browsing provided
entry.label: browsing

entry.description: online file access provided
entry.label: fileAccess

entry.description: digital representation of a primarily textual item (can contain illustrations also)
entry.label: documentDigital

entry.description: representation of a primarily textual item (can contain illustrations also) on paper, photograhic material, or other media
entry.label: imageDigital

entry.description: likeness of natural or man-made features, objects, and activities acquired through the sensing of visual or any other segment of the electromagnetic spectrum by sensors, such as thermal infrared, and high resolution radar and stored in digital format
entry.label: documentHardcopy

entry.description: likeness of natural or man-made features, objects, and activities acquired through the sensing of visual or any other segment of the electromagnetic spectrum by sensors, such as thermal infrared, and high resolution radar and reproduced on paper, photographic material, or other media for use directly by the human user
entry.label: imageHardcopy

entry.description: map represented in raster or vector form
entry.label: mapDigital

entry.description: map printed on paper, photographic material, or other media for use directly by the human user
entry.label: mapHardcopy

entry.description: multi-dimensional digital representation of a feature, process, etc.
entry.label: modelDigital

entry.description: 3-dimensional, physical model
entry.label: modelHardcopy

entry.description: vertical cross-section in digital form
entry.label: profileDigital

entry.description: vertical cross-section printed on paper, etc.
entry.label: profileHardcopy

entry.description: digital representation of facts or figures systematically displayed, especially in columns
entry.label: tableDigital

entry.description: representation of facts or figures systematically displayed, especially in columns, printed onpapers, photographic material, or other media
entry.label: tableHardcopy

entry.description: digital video recording
entry.label: videoDigital

entry.description: video recording on film
entry.label: videoHardcopy

entry.description: digital audio recording
entry.label: audioDigital

entry.description: audio recording delivered by analog media, such as a magnetic tape
entry.label: audioHardcopy

entry.description: information representation using simultaneously various digital modes for text, sound, image
entry.label: multimediaDigital

entry.description: information representation using simultaneously various analog modes for text, sound, image
entry.label: multimediaHardcopy

entry.description: a physical object, e.g. Rock or mineral sample, microscope slide
entry.label: physicalSample

entry.description: information represented graphically by charts such as pie chart, bar chart, and other type of diagrams and recorded in digital format
entry.label: diagramDigital

entry.description: information represented graphically by charts such as pie chart, bar chart, and other type of diagrams and printed on paper, phototographic material, or other media
entry.label: diagramHardcopy

entry.description: party that supplies the resource
entry.label: resourceProvider

entry.description: party that accepts accountability and responsability for the data and ensures appropriate care and maintenance of the resource
entry.label: custodian

entry.description: party that owns the resource
entry.label: owner

entry.description: party that sponsors the resource
entry.label: sponsor

entry.description: party who uses the resource
entry.label: user

entry.description: party who distributes the resource
entry.label: distributor

entry.description: party who created the resource
entry.label: originator

entry.description: party who can be contacted for acquiring knowledge about or acquisition of the resource
entry.label: pointOfContact

entry.description: key party responsible for gathering information and conducting research
entry.label: principalInvestigator

entry.description: party who has processed the data in a manner such that the resource has been modified
entry.label: processor

entry.description: party who published the resource
entry.label: publisher

entry.description: party who authored the resource
entry.label: author

entry.description: party who jointly authors the resource
entry.label: coAuthor

entry.description: party who assists with the generation of the resource other than the principal investigator
entry.label: collaborator

entry.description: party who reviewed or modified the resource to improve the content
entry.label: editor

entry.description: a class of entity that mediates access to the resource and for whom the resource is intended or useful
entry.label: mediator

entry.description: party owning or managing rights over the resource
entry.label: rightsHolder

entry.description: party contributing to the resource
entry.label: contributor

entry.description: party providing monetary support for the resource
entry.label: funder

entry.description: party who has an interest in the resource or the use of the resource
entry.label: stakeholder

entry.description: reference from one dataset to another
entry.label: crossReference

entry.description: reference to a master dataset of which this one is a part
entry.label: largerWorkCitation

entry.description: part of the same structured set of data held in a computer
entry.label: partOfSeamlessDatabase

entry.description: mapping and charting information from which the dataset content originates
entry.label: source

entry.description: part of a set of imagery that when used together, provides three-dimensional images
entry.label: stereoMate

entry.description: reference to resources that are parts of this resource
entry.label: isComposedOf

entry.description: common title for a collection of resources. NOTE: title identifies elements of a series collectively, combined with information about what volumes are available at the source cite
entry.label: collectiveTitle

entry.description: associated through a common heritage such as produced to a common product specification
entry.label: series

entry.description: associated through a dependency
entry.label: dependency

entry.description: resource is a revision of associated resource
entry.label: revisionOf

entry.description: each cell represents a point
entry.label: point

entry.description: each cell represents an area
entry.label: area

entry.description: each cell represents a volumetric measurement on a regular grid in three dimensional space
entry.label: voxel

entry.description: height range for a single point vertical profile
entry.label: stratum

entry.description: available for general disclosure
entry.label: unclassified

entry.description: not for general disclosure
entry.label: restricted

entry.description: available for someone who can be entrusted with information
entry.label: confidential

entry.description: kept or meant to be kept private, unknown, or hidden from all but a select group of people
entry.label: secret

entry.description: of the highest secrecy
entry.label: topSecret

entry.description: although unclassified, requires strict controls over its distribution
entry.label: SBU

entry.description: unclassified information that is to be used only for official purposes determined by the designating body
entry.label: forOfficialUseOnly

entry.description: compromise of the information could cause damage
entry.label: protected

entry.description: desimination limited by designating body
entry.label: limitedDistribution

entry.description: meaningful numerical representation of a physical parameter that is not the actual value of the physical parameter
entry.label: image

entry.description: code value with no quantitative meaning, used to represent a physical quantity
entry.label: thematicClassification

entry.description: value in physical units of the quantity being measured
entry.label: physicalMeasurement

entry.description: data, usually a physical measurement, used to support the calculation of the primary physicalMeasurement coverages in the dataset (e.g. grid of aerosol optical thickness used in the calculation of a sea surface temperature product).
entry.label: auxillaryInformation

entry.description: data used to characterize the quality of the physicalMeasurement coverages in the dataset. Typically included in a gmi:QE_CoverageResult.
entry.label: qualityInformation

entry.description: reference information used to support the calculation or use of the physicalMeasurement coverages in the dataset (e.g. grids of latitude/longitude used to geolocate the physical measurements).
entry.label: referenceInformation

entry.description: resources with values that are calculated using a model rather than being observed or calculated from observations.
entry.label: modelResult

entry.description: data used to provide coordinate axis values
entry.label: coordinate

entry.description: values of extraneous data that are not part of the physical measurement
entry.label: auxilliaryData

entry.description: keyword identifies a branch of instruction or specialized learning
entry.label: discipline

entry.description: keyword identifies a location
entry.label: place

entry.description: keyword identifies a temporal or spatial resolution
entry.label: dataResolution

entry.description: keyword identifies the layer(s) of any deposited substance
entry.label: stratum

entry.description: keyword identifies a time period related to the dataset
entry.label: temporal

entry.description: keyword identifies a particular subject or topic
entry.label: theme

entry.description: keyword identifies a repository or archive that manages and distributes data
entry.label: dataCentre

entry.description: keyword identifies a resource containing or about a collection of feature instances with common characteristics
entry.label: featureType

entry.description: keyword identifies a device used to measure or compare physical properties
entry.label: instrument

entry.description: keyword identifies a structure upon which an instrument is mounted
entry.label: platform

entry.description: keyword identifies a series of actions or natural occurrences
entry.label: process

entry.description: keyword identifies an endeavour undertaken to create or modify a product or service
entry.label: project

entry.description: keyword identifies an activity carried out by one party for the benefit of another
entry.label: service

entry.description: keyword identifies a type of product
entry.label: product

entry.description: refinement of a topic category for the purpose of geographic data classification
entry.label: subTopicCategory

entry.description: data is repeatedly and frequently updated
entry.label: continual

entry.description: data is updated each day
entry.label: daily

entry.description: data is updated on a weekly basis
entry.label: weekly

entry.description: data is updated every two weeks
entry.label: fortnightly

entry.description: data is updated each month
entry.label: monthly

entry.description: data is updated every three months
entry.label: quarterly

entry.description: data is updated twice each year
entry.label: biannually

entry.description: data is updated every year
entry.label: annually

entry.description: data is updated as deemed necessary
entry.label: asNeeded

entry.description: data is updated in intervals that are uneven in duration
entry.label: irregular

entry.description: there are no plans to update the data
entry.label: notPlanned

entry.description: frequency of maintenance for the data is not known
entry.label: unknown

entry.description: CoPy In / Out (UNIX file format and command)
entry.label: cpio

entry.description: Tape ARchive
entry.label: tar

entry.description: high sierra file system for optical disks - not to be confused with the Apple File System, introduced with High Sierra
entry.label: highSierra

entry.description: information processing volume and file structure of CD-ROM (iso disk images)
entry.label: iso9660

entry.description: rock ridge interchange protocol (UNIX)
entry.label: iso9660RockRidge

entry.description: hierarchical file system (Macintosh, widely used pre-1998))
entry.label: iso9660AppleHFS

entry.description: universal disk format
entry.label: udf

entry.description: Blu-ray disc audio-video MPEG-2 transport stream container file format
entry.label: m2ts

entry.description: File allocation table and derivatives (widely used on read-writable physical disks)
entry.label: fat

entry.description: hierarchical file system plus (Macintosh OS 8.1 and later)
entry.label: hfsplus

entry.description: Apple file system (macOS High Sierra and later)
entry.label: apfs

entry.description: New technology file system (Windows)
entry.label: ntfs

entry.description: Extended filesystem (Linux, multiple versions)
entry.label: ext

entry.description: read-only optical disk, usually with a capacity of about 700 MB
entry.label: cdRom

entry.description: digital versatile disk, usually with a capacity of about 4.5 GB
entry.label: dvd

entry.description: digital versatile disk, read only
entry.label: dvdRom

entry.description: 3,5 inch magnetic disk
entry.label: 3halfInchFloppy

entry.description: 5,25 inch magnetic disk
entry.label: 5quarterInchFloppy

entry.description: 7 track magnetic tape
entry.label: 7trackTape

entry.description: 9 track magnetic tape
entry.label: 9trackType

entry.description: 3480 cartridge tape drive
entry.label: 3480Cartridge

entry.description: 3490 cartridge tape drive
entry.label: 3490Cartridge

entry.description: 3580 cartridge tape drive
entry.label: 3580Cartridge

entry.description: 4 millimetre magnetic tape
entry.label: 4mmCartridgeTape

entry.description: 8 millimetre magnetic tape
entry.label: 8mmCartridgeTape

entry.description: 0,25 inch magnetic tape
entry.label: 1quarterInchCartridgeTape

entry.description: half inch cartridge streaming tape drive
entry.label: digitalLinearTape

entry.description: direct computer linkage
entry.label: onLine

entry.description: linkage through a satellite communication system
entry.label: satellite

entry.description: communication through a telephone network
entry.label: telephoneLink

entry.description: pamphlet or leaflet giving descriptive information
entry.label: hardcopy

entry.description: optical disk, usually with a capacity of 25 or 50 GB
entry.label: blu-ray

entry.description: Rotating magnetic disk drive with a 2.5 inch formfactor, which can be connected directly to a computer using a parallel ATA connection
entry.label: 2halfInchPATAHardDiskDrive

entry.description: Rotating magnetic disk drive with a 2.5 inch formfactor, which can be connected directly to a computer using a parallel ATA connection
entry.label: 3halfInchPATAHardDiskDrive

entry.description: Rotating magnetic disk drive with a 2.5 inch formfactor, which can be connected directly to a computer using a serial ATA connection
entry.label: 2halfInchSATAHardDiskDrive

entry.description: Rotating magnetic disk drive with a 2.5 inch formfactor, which can be connected directly to a computer using a serial ATA connection
entry.label: 3halfInchSATAHardDiskDrive

entry.description: Secure Digital (or its mini or micro variants) memory card
entry.label: SDCard

entry.description: Any other memory card, such as the 'Memory Stick', 'CompactFlash' or 'Picture Card'
entry.label: OtherMemoryCard

entry.description: production of the data has been completed
entry.label: completed

entry.description: data has been stored in an offline storage facility
entry.label: historicalArchive

entry.description: data is no longer relevant
entry.label: obsolete

entry.description: data is continually being updated
entry.label: onGoing

entry.description: fixed date has been established upon or by which the data will be created or updated
entry.label: planned

entry.description: data needs to be generated or updated
entry.label: required

entry.description: data is currently in the process of being created
entry.label: underDevelopment

entry.description: progress concluded and no changes will be accepted
entry.label: final

entry.description: committed to, but not yet addressed
entry.label: pending

entry.description: item is no longer recommended for use. It has not been superseded by another item
entry.label: retired

entry.description: replaced by new
entry.label: superseded

entry.description: provisional changes likely before resource becomes final or complete
entry.label: tentative

entry.description: acceptable under specific conditions
entry.label: valid

entry.description: agreed to by sponsor
entry.label: accepted

entry.description: rejected by sponsor
entry.label: notAccepted

entry.description: removed from consideration
entry.label: withdrawn

entry.description: suggested that development needs to be undertaken
entry.label: proposed

entry.description: resource superseded and will become obsolete, use only for historical purposes
entry.label: deprecated

entry.description: exclusive right to the publication, production, or sale of the rights to a literary, dramatic, musical, or artistic work, or to the use of a commercial print or label, granted by law for a specified period of time to an author, composer, artist, distributor
entry.label: copyright

entry.description: government has granted exclusive right to make, sell, use or license an invention or discovery
entry.label: patent

entry.description: produced or sold information awaiting a patent
entry.label: patentPending

entry.description: a name, symbol, or other device identifying a product, officially registered and legally restricted to the use of the owner or manufacturer
entry.label: trademark

entry.description: formal permission to do something
entry.label: license

entry.description: rights to financial benefit from and control of distribution of non-tangible property that is a result of creativity
entry.label: intellectualPropertyRights

entry.description: withheld from general circulation or disclosure
entry.label: restricted

entry.description: limitation not listed
entry.label: otherRestrictions

entry.description: no constraints exist
entry.label: unrestricted

entry.description: formal permission not required to use the resource
entry.label: licenceUnrestricted

entry.description: formal permission required for a person or an entity to use the resource and that may differ from the person that orders or purchases it
entry.label: licenceEndUser

entry.description: formal permission required for a person or an entity to commercialize or distribute the resource
entry.label: licenceDistributor

entry.description: protects rights of individual or organisations from observation, intrusion, or attention of others
entry.label: private

entry.description: prescribed by law
entry.label: statutory

entry.description: not available to the public contains information that could be prejudicial to a commercial, industrial, or national interest
entry.label: confidential

entry.description: although unclassified, requires strict controls over its distribution.
entry.label: SBU

entry.description: with trust
entry.label: in-confidence

entry.description: information applies to the attribute class
entry.label: attribute

entry.description: information applies to the characteristic of a feature
entry.label: attributeType

entry.description: information applies to the collection hardware class
entry.label: collectionHardware

entry.description: information applies to the collection session
entry.label: collectionSession

entry.description: information applies to the dataset
entry.label: dataset

entry.description: information applies to the series
entry.label: series

entry.description: information applies to non-geographic data
entry.label: nonGeographicDataset

entry.description: information applies to a dimension group
entry.label: dimensionGroup

entry.description: information applies to a feature
entry.label: feature

entry.description: information applies to a feature type
entry.label: featureType

entry.description: information applies to a property type
entry.label: propertyType

entry.description: information applies to a field session
entry.label: fieldSession

entry.description: information applies to a computer program or routine
entry.label: software

entry.description: information applies to a copy or imitation of an existing or hypothetical object
entry.label: model

entry.description: information applies to a tile, a spatial subset of geographic data
entry.label: tile

entry.description: information applies to metadata
entry.label: metadata

entry.description: information applies to an initiative
entry.label: initiative

entry.description: information applies to a sample
entry.label: sample

entry.description: information applies to a document
entry.label: document

entry.description: information applies to an aggregate resource
entry.label: aggregate

entry.description: metadata describing an ISO 19131 data product specification
entry.label: product

entry.description: information applies to an unstructured set
entry.label: collection

entry.description: information applies to a coverage
entry.label: coverage

entry.description: information applies to the dataset
entry.label: dataset

entry.description: information applies to the series
entry.label: series

entry.description: information applies to non-geographic data
entry.label: nonGeographicDataset

entry.description: information applies to a computer program or routine
entry.label: software

entry.description: information applies to a copy or imitation of an existing or hypothetical object
entry.label: model

entry.description: information applies to an initiative
entry.label: initiative

entry.description: information applies to a sample
entry.label: sample

entry.description: information applies to an aggregate resource
entry.label: aggregate

entry.description: rearing of animals and/or cultivation of plants. Examples: agriculture, irrigation, aquaculture, plantations, herding, pests and diseases affecting crops and livestock
entry.label: farming

entry.description: flora and/or fauna in natural environment. Examples: wildlife, vegetation, biological sciences, ecology, wilderness, sealife, wetlands, habitat
entry.label: biota

entry.description: legal land descriptions. Examples: political and administrative boundaries
entry.label: boundaries

entry.description: processes and phenomena of the atmosphere. Examples: cloud cover, weather, climate, atmospheric conditions, climate change, precipitation
entry.label: climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere

entry.description: economic activities, conditions and employment. Examples: production, labour, revenue, commerce, industry, tourism and ecotourism, forestry, fisheries, commercial or subsistence hunting, exploration and exploitation of resources such as minerals, oil and gas
entry.label: economy

entry.description: height above or below sea level. Examples: altitude, bathymetry, digital elevation models, slope, derived products
entry.label: elevation

entry.description: environmental resources, protection and conservation. Examples: environmental pollution, waste storage and treatment, environmental impact assessment, monitoring environmental risk, nature reserves, landscape
entry.label: environment

entry.description: information pertaining to earth sciences. Examples: geophysical features and processes, geology, minerals, sciences dealing with the composition, structure and origin of the earth s rocks, risks of earthquakes, volcanic activity, landslides, gravity information, soils, permafrost, hydrogeology, erosion
entry.label: geoscientificInformation

entry.description: health, health services, human ecology, and safety. Examples: disease and illness, factors affecting health, hygiene, substance abuse, mental and physical health, health services
entry.label: health

entry.description: base maps. Examples: land cover, topographic maps, imagery, unclassified images, annotations
entry.label: imageryBaseMapsEarthCover

entry.description: military bases, structures, activities. Examples: barracks, training grounds, military transportation, information collection
entry.label: intelligenceMilitary

entry.description: inland water features, drainage systems and their characteristics. Examples: rivers and glaciers, salt lakes, water utilization plans, dams, currents, floods, water quality, hydrographic charts
entry.label: inlandWaters

entry.description: positional information and services. Examples: addresses, geodetic networks, control points, postal zones and services, place names
entry.label: location

entry.description: features and characteristics of salt water bodies (excluding inland waters). Examples: tides, tidal waves, coastal information, reefs
entry.label: oceans

entry.description: information used for appropriate actions for future use of the land. Examples: land use maps, zoning maps, cadastral surveys, land ownership
entry.label: planningCadastre

entry.description: characteristics of society and cultures. Examples: settlements, anthropology, archaeology, education, traditional beliefs, manners and customs, demographic data, recreational areas and activities, social impact assessments, crime and justice, census information
entry.label: society

entry.description: man-made construction. Examples: buildings, museums, churches, factories, housing, monuments, shops, towers
entry.label: structure

entry.description: means and aids for conveying persons and/or goods. Examples: roads, airports/airstrips, shipping routes, tunnels, nautical charts, vehicle or vessel location, aeronautical charts, railways
entry.label: transportation

entry.description: energy, water and waste systems and communications infrastructure and services. Examples: hydroelectricity, geothermal, solar and nuclear sources of energy, water purification and distribution, sewage collection and disposal, electricity and gas distribution, data communication, telecommunication, radio, communication networks
entry.label: utilitiesCommunication

entry.description: region more than 100 km above the surface of the Earth
entry.label: extraTerrestrial

entry.description: Information related to disasters. Examples: site of the disaster, evacuation zone, disaster-prevention facility, disaster relief activities
entry.label: disaster

entry.description: width of a distribution equal to the distance between the outer two points on the distribution having power level half of that at the peak
entry.label: 3db

entry.description: width of a distribution equal to the distance between the outer two points on the distribution having power level half of that at the peak
entry.label: halfMaximum

entry.description: full spectral width of a spectral power density measured at 50% of its peak height
entry.label: fiftyPercent

entry.description: width of a distribution equal to the distance between the outer two points on the distribution having power level 1/e that of the peak
entry.label: oneOverE

entry.description: width of a band with full sensitivity or absorption at every wavelength that detects or absorbs the same amount of energy as the band described
entry.label: equivalentWidth

entry.description: event related to a specific domain
entry.label: acqisition

entry.description: event related to a sequence of collections
entry.label: pass

entry.description: event related to navigational manoeuvre
entry.label: wayPoint

entry.description: single geographic point of interest
entry.label: point

entry.description: extended collection in a single vector
entry.label: linear

entry.description: collection of a geographic area defined by a polygon (coverage)
entry.label: areal

entry.description: series of linear collections grouped by way points
entry.label: strip

entry.description: single instance of collection
entry.label: instantaneousCollection

entry.description: multiple instances of collection
entry.label: persistentView

entry.description: collection over specified domain
entry.label: survey

entry.description: originates from live-fly or other non-simulated operational source
entry.label: real

entry.description: originates from target simulator sources
entry.label: simulated

entry.description: mix of real and simulated data
entry.label: synthesized

entry.description: polarization of the sensor oriented in the horizontal plane in realtion to the swath direction
entry.label: horizontal

entry.description: polarization of the sensor oriented in the vertical plane in realtion to the swath direction
entry.label: vertical

entry.description: polarization of the sensor oriented in the left circular plane in realtion to the swath direction
entry.label: leftCircular

entry.description: polarization of the sensor oriented in the right circular plane in realtion to the swath direction
entry.label: rightCircular

entry.description: polarization of the sensor oriented in the angle between +90 deg and 0 deg parallel to swath direction
entry.label: theta

entry.description: polarization of the sensor oriented in the angle between +90 deg and 0 deg perpendicular to swath direction
entry.label: phi

entry.description: decisive importance
entry.label: critical

entry.description: requires resources to be made available
entry.label: highImportance

entry.description: normal operation priority
entry.label: mediumImportance

entry.description: to be completed when resources are available
entry.label: lowImportance

entry.description: beginning of a collection
entry.label: start

entry.description: end of a collection
entry.label: end

entry.description: collection without a significant duration
entry.label: instantaneous

entry.description: beginning of a collection
entry.label: linear

entry.description: end of a collection
entry.label: logarithmic

entry.description: collection without a significant duration
entry.label: exponential

entry.description: event due to external stimuli
entry.label: automatic

entry.description: event manually instigated
entry.label: manual

entry.description: event instigated by planned internal stimuli
entry.label: preProgrammed

entry.description: information applies to the attribute class
entry.label: attribute

entry.description: information applies to the characteristic of a feature
entry.label: attributeType

entry.description: information applies to the collection hardware class
entry.label: collectionHardware

entry.description: information applies to the collection session
entry.label: collectionSession

entry.description: information applies to the dataset
entry.label: dataset

entry.description: information applies to the series
entry.label: series

entry.description: information applies to non-geographic data
entry.label: nonGeographicDataset

entry.description: information applies to a dimension group
entry.label: dimensionGroup

entry.description: information applies to a feature
entry.label: feature

entry.description: information applies to a feature type
entry.label: featureType

entry.description: information applies to a property type
entry.label: propertyType

entry.description: information applies to a field session
entry.label: fieldSession

entry.description: information applies to a computer program or routine
entry.label: software

entry.description: information applies to a capability which a service provider entity makes available to a service user entity through a set of interfaces that define a behaviour, such as a use case
entry.label: service

entry.description: information applies to a copy or imitation of an existing or hypothetical object
entry.label: model

entry.description: information applies to a tile, a spatial subset of geographic data
entry.label: tile

entry.description: The referencing entity applies to a transfer aggregate which was originally identified as an initiative (DS_Initiative)
entry.label: initiative

entry.description: The referencing entity applies to a transfer aggregate which was originally identified as a stereo mate (DS_StereoMate)
entry.label: stereomate

entry.description: The referencing entity applies to a transfer aggregate which was originally identified as a sensor (DS_Sensor)
entry.label: sensor

entry.description: The referencing entity applies to a transfer aggregate which was originally identified as a platform series (DS_PlatformSeries)
entry.label: platformSeries

entry.description: The referencing entity applies to a transfer aggregate which was originally identified as a sensor series (DS_SensorSeries)
entry.label: sensorSeries

entry.description: The referencing entity applies to a transfer aggregate which was originally identified as a production series (DS_ProductionSeries)
entry.label: productionSeries

entry.description: The referencing entity applies to a transfer aggregate which has no existence outside of the transfer context
entry.label: transferAggregate

entry.description: The referencing entity applies to a transfer aggregate which has an existence outside of the transfer context, but which does not pertains to a specific aggregate type.
entry.label: otherAggregate

entry.description: component object model - Microsoft's framework for developing and supporting program component objects
entry.label: COM

entry.description: common object request broker architecture
entry.label: CORBA

entry.description: JAVA programming language
entry.label: JAVA

entry.description: structured query language - a standard interactive and programming language for getting information from and updating a database
entry.label: SQL

entry.description: Web based services
entry.label: WebServices

entry.description: extensible markup language
entry.label: XML

entry.description: A physical results of a sampling (or subsampling) event. In biological collections, the material sample is typically collected, and either preserved or destructively processed.
entry.label: MaterialSample

entry.description: A specimen that is alive.
entry.label: LivingSpecimen

entry.description: A specimen that has been preserved.
entry.label: PreservedSpecimen

entry.description: A preserved specimen that is a fossil.
entry.label: FossilSpecimen

entry.description: An output of a human observation process.
entry.label: HumanObservation

entry.description: An output of a machine observation process.
entry.label: MachineObservation

entry.description: record has not been checked by any authority
name determined by comparison with other records
name determined by comparison with living exemplar
name determined by taxonomist in group
"The record is part of type gathering or propagated from type material by asexual methods " - not recommended for acoustic measurements
An aggregation of resources.
entry.label: Collection

entry.description: Data encoded in a defined structure, such as lists, tables, and databases.
entry.label: Dataset

entry.description: A specific, non-persistent, time-based occurrence.
entry.label: Event

entry.description: Any visual representation other than text, such as maps, slides, diagrams...
entry.label: Image

entry.description: A resource which requires user interaction to be understood or experienced.
entry.label: InteractiveResource

entry.description: A series of visuals which convey the impression of motion when shown in succession.
entry.label: MovingImage

entry.description: An inanimate 3D object or substance.
entry.label: PhysicalObject

entry.description: A system which provides one or more functions.
entry.label: Service

entry.description: A compiled computer program.
entry.label: Software

entry.description: A resource primarily intended to be heard.
entry.label: Sound

entry.description: A static visual representation. Note if the content is primarily text, assign the Text type.
entry.label: StillImage

entry.description: A resource primarily consisting of words for reading
entry.label: Text
